data: Toward the close of a May afternoon in the year 1884, Miss Priscilla Batte, having learned by heart the lesson in physical geography she would teach her senior class on the morrow, stood feeding her canary on the little square porch of the Dinwiddie Academy for Young Ladies.
May afternoon | Dinwiddie Academy for Young Ladies
porch of the Dinwiddie Academy for Young Ladies
